item.title: Judge Tosses Criminal Charges Against James Comey and Letitia James
item.description: The decision is a setback for the president’s efforts to wield the criminal justice system against his perceived enemies.

item.title: Drug Arrests and Gun Seizures Fell as Homeland Security Pursued Immigration
item.description: Internal documents reveal the impact on crime fighting as the Trump administration diverts special agents to its mass deportation agenda.
